title: Civilization VII Zipper Configuration
description: Configuration for zipping and unzipping Civilization VII game resources.

$schema.description: The JSON schema for this file.

src_path.description: Optional override for the game's resource directory path. If not provided, the script will use the default path for your OS.

default.description: The default profile for a minimal, gameplay-focused resource set.

full.description: The 'full' profile for zipping nearly all game resources.

assets.description: The 'assets' profile for zipping only media assets like icons, fonts, and movies.

include.description: A list of file patterns to include in the zip archive. If present, only these files will be included.

exclude.description: A list of file patterns to exclude from the zip archive. Used when 'include' is not present.

zip_path.description: The path where the final .zip archive will be saved.

extract_path.description: The directory where the archive will be extracted.
